title: The Life of a Colonial Fugitive
description: An historical thriller based in the American Revolution. Young Jonathan E. Lee finds himself falsely accused of heinous war crimes by his treacherous regimental commander! Jonathan is forced to flee the colonies to save his neck from the hangman's noose, fighting his way across the stormy Atlantic and joining a mercenary army that is deploying to war-torn Siam, a kingdom that is squirming under the ironfist of a madman!Dr. Leonardo NotoPracticing Physician, Author of Four Books, and Owner of "The Health and Medical Blog with a Personality," www.leonardonoto.com.
author: Leonardo Antony Noto
